name: SHIVPRABHA CHARITABLE TRUST

address: A-104, Kaasp Country, Kaspte Vasti, Wakad,

briefDescription: We as a team www.shivprabha.org working in Rural India for Rural Development, Education, Yoga and health. We are working on initiative like electrifying unelectrified students and till date we touch 400 lives. We are trying to electrify unelectrified villages and touched about 6 villages in last 8 years to make them developed and self-sustainable village. We are empowering wives of died farmers in Maharashtra, India and till date we touched such 150 lives. In terms of health we touch lives of many patients for Heart surgery, kidney transplantation, cancer, sickle cell, diabetics and etc. We provided scholarship to more than 100 students starting from primary to higher education.We enlighten lives of hundreds of souls in terms meditation.
